title._content: Image taken from page 6 of '[Striking and picturesque delineations of the ... scenery around Loch-Earn. MS. note [by Henry Lord Cockburn].]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Striking and picturesque delineations of the ... scenery around Loch-Earn. MS. note [by Henry Lord Cockburn].]" Author: MACDIARMID, Angus. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10347.c.7.(4.)" Page: 6 Place of Publishing: Lochearnhead Date of Publishing: 1877 Edition: New illustrated edition, with explanatory notes. Edited by Fear-Gallda. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002309043 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
